data.text: @joe_cressy Are the mass clinics gone? My husband @CornerThom has been trying to get a second vax appointment for our 5yo who will be eligible April 1st. He was told appointments would be available about a month in advance. He keeps checking and nothing is set up. Please advise. Thank you!
@joe_cressy @shelleylaskin Please inform yourselves everyone. Read Pages 30-38‼️ https://t.co/WOQXHHUag0

@joe_cressy Kids don’t need the vaccine. They have wonderful and Healthy immune systems. The more immunity they build up as kids the healthier they are long term.  Teaching them to eat right, exercise and get rest will provide greater long term health benefits than an experimental shot will.
@joe_cressy Give it up man . RCT studies show the 💉 does not work. Heck....#pfizerdocuments show it is dangerous. Do you have no moral compass? https://t.co/vsHRQFniBR

@joe_cressy Protect your child from ending up in hospital, consider getting your child 5-11 first dose of COVID 19 vaccine. Help prevent your child from getting sick for more than 4 weeks, consider getting your child 5-11 first dose of COVID 19 vaccine
